Terhubung dengan lebih dari 500.000 calon pengantin setiap bulan

Berikan klien Anda
opsi pembayaran yang beragam

home.content_8:
Kumpulkan Bridestory Poin untuk setiap transaksi dan tukarkan dengan
Produk dan Layanan Bridestory secara GRATIS!
home.content_10: Kami akan membantu proses marketing agar Anda dapat fokus dengan bisnis Anda. Platform kami menghasilkan lebih dari 4.000.000 peluang bisnis dan menggapai lebih dari 6.000.000 pasangan calon pengantin dari seluruh penjuru dunia setiap tahunnya.

Tanggapi dan berbincanglah dengan calon pengantin secara langsung dengan
aplikasi Bridestory Pro kami!
home.content_17:
Kelola bisnis Anda
kapan pun, di mana pun

home.content_22: Perbaharui informasi seputar bisnis Anda secara berkala
home.content_25: Vendor yang Telah Bergabung dengan Kami

benefits.title: Bangun sebuah online presence yang tepat
benefits.content_1:
Anda dapat terhubung dengan 500.000 pasang calon pengantin yang sedang mencari vendor
pernikahan impian mereka di Bridestory setiap bulan
benefits.content_2: "Bridestory telah memberi dampak yang positif terhadap bisnis saya!" Nama Vendor - Bridal, Indonesia
benefits.content_4: Lebih dari 20.000 vendor pernikahan dari 70 negara telah bergabung dengan Bridestory untuk membangun sebuah online presence dan terhubung dengan audiens yang tepat.
benefits.content_6: Tim ahli kami akan membantu mengoptimalkan hasil pencarian lewat search engine agar Anda dapat fokus pada bisnis yang dijalankan.
benefits.content_8: Calon pengantin masa kini memiliki mobilitas lebih tinggi. Aplikasi mobile yang telah meraih berbagai penghargaan serta situs kami akan memudahkan mereka untuk menemukan vendor pernikahan yang tepat.
benefits.content_9: By being listed in Bridestory, they will be able to find you instantly. ID
benefits.content_11: Kini Anda dapat meraih lebih banyak klien potensial sekaligus mengembangkan bisnis Anda.
benefits.content_12:
Jadilah sebuah bisnis global hanya dengan
satu tombol
benefits.content_13: Kami akan membantu Anda melebarkan skala bisnis hingga mencapai beberapa kota dan negara dengan mudah. Cukup tambahkan nama kota di profil Anda dan bersiaplah mendapatkan klien dari seluruh penjuru dunia!
benefits.content_14:
Manfaatkan Jaringan Sosial
Kami yang Besar
benefits.content_15: Bersiaplah untuk terekspos pada lebih dari 3 juta pengguna media sosial kami. Kami telah dikenal handal dalam memanfaatkan media sosial secara efektif untuk membantu vendor kami berkembang.
benefits.content_17: Terhubunglah dengan jutaan pasang calon pengantin dari 170+ negara yang menggunakan Bridestory setiap tahun.
benefits.content_18: Bangun interaksi langsung dengan klien potensial
benefits.content_19: Lihat perkembangan bisnis Anda kapan pun dan di mana pun Anda berada.
benefits.content_21: Pengalaman Anda sangat berharga. Kami senantiasa mengoptimalkan platform kami agar vendor pernikahan dan calon pengantin dapat terhubung secara langsung kapan pun, di mana pun.
benefits.content_23: Pantau performa bisnis Anda setiap saat berdasarkan statistik yang real time, lalu tanggapi pertanyaan atau permintaan secara cepat dengan fitur pesan kami.
benefits.content_25: Gunakan aplikasi Bridestory Pro kami untuk mengatur bisnis Anda kapan pun, di mana pun. Dapatkan secara gratis di
benefits.content_26: untuk mengembangkan bisnis Anda dengan kami? Buat profil bisnis Anda secara GRATIS sekarang!

home.title:
The Right Place To Grow Your
Wedding Business
home.sub_title:
Join more than 20,000 wedding vendors from 70 countries who have
connected with millions of engaged couples through Bridestory.
home.form_cond_1: By clicking “Start Free Trial”, you agree to our Terms & Conditions
home.form_cond_2: Have an account? Login to your dashboard
home.content_3:
Be discovered by more than 500,000 brides-to-be / month
by setting up your business profile on Bridestory!
home.content_4:
Provide your clients with various
payment options
home.content_5: Bridestory Pay is a wedding payment solution that will provide many benefits, including
home.content_6: 0% installment up to 24 months from 10 banks for your clients
home.content_7: FREE Wedding Cancellation Protection for your clients
home.content_8:
Earn More Bridestory Points for every transactions and redeem to get
Bridestory Product and Services for FREE!
home.content_10: We let you focus on your great work and leave the marketing  to us. Our platform generates 4,000,000+ business inquiries and reached 6,000,000+ engaged couples from Indonesia and around the world every year.
home.content_11:
Interact real time
with potential clients
home.content_12:
Follow up and chat with brides-to-be directly with our
Bridestory Pro app!
home.content_19: See who your potential clients are and reach out to them
home.content_22: Keep your business information up to date
home.content_26: Want to grow your business with us? Create your FREE business profile now!
home.content_28: Resources you need to grow your wedding business.

benefits.title: Build an online presence that works
benefits.content_1:
You can connect to the 500,000 engaged couples who are looking for the right wedding
vendors in Bridestory each month
benefits.content_2: "Bridestory, has given a great impact to my business!" Vendor Name - Bridal, Indonesia
benefits.content_3:
Largest Wedding Marketplace
in South East Asia
benefits.content_4: 20,000+ wedding vendors from 70 countries have joined Bridestory to establish their online presence and reach the right audience.
benefits.content_6: Our expert team will help you optimize your search engine result so you can simply focus on your business.
benefits.content_8: Brides-to-be are becoming more mobile. Our award-winning mobile app and website makes it easy for them to find the right vendors.
benefits.content_9: By being listed in Bridestory, they will be able to find you instantly.
benefits.content_11: Now you can reach more potential clients and grow your wedding business altogether.
benefits.content_12:
Go Global in a click
of a button
benefits.content_13: We enable you to scale your business to multiple cities and countries easily. Just add city on your profile and be ready to get booked by clients accross the globe!
benefits.content_15: Be exposed to our 3+ million social media users. We've been recognized for effectively using social media to help our vendors grow.
benefits.content_17: Be found by millions of engaged couples who use Bridestory every year from 170+ countries.
benefits.content_18: Interact real time with potential clients
benefits.content_19: See your business grow everyday, everywhere.
benefits.content_21: Your experience is valuable. We continuously optimize our platform so both vendors and brides-to-be can seamlessly connect anytime, anywhere.
benefits.content_23: Monitor your business performance around the clock with real time statistics, and respond to business inquiries immediately with our messaging feature.
benefits.content_25: Use our Bridestory Pro app to manage your business anytime, anywhere. Get it for free from
benefits.content_26: to grow your business with us? Create your FREE business profile now!
